title: How Mermaids Feel
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Kanan-san, may I interview you....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Interview? About what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Umm, actually, I’m going to play the role of a girl that wants to become a diver in the next theater club performance.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, that sounds interesting~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>So I wanted to ask you about what it’s like diving in the ocean.... Like, how do you feel? What are you thinking about? What things do you see?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, no need to rush. I’ll answer everything.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I-, I’m sorry....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, that’s right.... It might be better if you try it for yourself. Why don’t you try diving? I can show you the ropes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>A-, are you sure!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Of course! I’d love for you to come and experience the sea of Uchiura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
